hero.title: Perfect Home Media
hero.subtitle: We brand your lifestyle
hero.description: We are more than a media agency. We are your partner in building a memorable brand.
hero.defaultDescription: We are more than a media agency. We are your partner in building a memorable brand.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: us
about.description: Perfect Home Media (PHM) is a full-service advertising agency, specializing in advertising production, event organization, and media services

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer complete solutions to help you promote your business and create memorable experiences for your clients.

advertising.title: Advertising Production
advertising.subtitle: Production
advertising.description: We provide you with a wide variety of materials with finishing options and promotional materials for any type of business. Our team members are ready to help you with printing solutions that will create customized marketing materials.

digitalPrinting.title: Digital Printing
digitalPrinting.description: Large format: stickers, banners, backlit, mesh, flags, posters, PVC panels.

printedMaterials.title: Printed Materials
printedMaterials.description: Design and production of brochures, catalogs, posters, flyers, and other printed materials for campaigns.

media.title: Media
media.subtitle: Services
media.description: We provide you with a dedicated platform for implementing fresh ideas and a healthy lifestyle. We propose the development of a communication plan for identifying the level of brand or business awareness.

productDevelopment.title: Product Development Strategies
productDevelopment.description: We develop media marketing strategies based on media channels and creative concept development.

audiovisualProduction.title: Audiovisual and Multimedia Production
audiovisualProduction.description: We produce video, audio, and multimedia materials for your product.

showCreation.title: Show Creation
showCreation.description: We believe that creating an Online Show dedicated to a specific, targeted audience can bring benefits

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Organization
events.description: We provide you with a wide range of events with high-tech standards. Regardless of your event, we offer consulting to execute any size or type of event.

socialEvents.title: Social and Charitable Events
socialEvents.description: We offer professional video capture services for charitable events, galas, and social initiatives, at cinematic quality, highlighting the emotion and message of the moment.

corporateEvents.title: Corporate Events
corporateEvents.description: We create high-resolution video materials for conferences, product launches, and business meetings, ideal for internal or external promotion.

thematicEvents.title: Thematic Events
thematicEvents.description: We capture the unique atmosphere of themed parties, anniversaries, and festivals with dynamic images and creative editing, perfect for online promotion.

services.contactUs: Contact us today for a free consultation and let's bring your ideas to life.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: us
contact.description: We are here to answer your questions and help you find the perfect solution for your videos.

address.title: Our Address
address.value: Strada Băbeşti nr 1, Sector 6, Bucharest, Romania

map.title: Visit us at Strada Băbeşti nr 1, Sector 6, Bucharest

footer.description: We are a platform and communication channel with experience in media and lifestyle production, offering creative solutions to support the success of any business in any field.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates about the latest technologies and projects.

footer.copyright: © 2025 Perfect Home Media. All rights reserved.

clients.title: Our Clients
clients.description: We have had the pleasure of working with a variety of clients from different industries. Here are some of our trusted partners.

becomeClient.title: Become Our Client
becomeClient.description: Join our growing list of satisfied clients and experience the difference of working with a professional media agency.
